name: isogrp
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, cogrp), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, comnd)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cogrp), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, comnd)))
-| wceq(cogrp, cin(cgrp, comnd))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ oMnd))
⊣ oGrp =(Grp ⋂ oMnd)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cogrp), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, comnd)))
-| wceq(cogrp, cin(cgrp, comnd))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ oGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c0 ∈ oMnd))
⊣ oGrp =(Grp ⋂ oMnd)

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cogrp), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c0, comnd)))

comment: A (left-)ordered group is a group with a total ordering compatible with its operations. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2018.)
